subject: Re: Simsonn Order #SSN2934 Logistics Inquiry
description_text:
Hi,
I have paid the extra shipping cost.



But with this augmentation, the price is the same on Aliexpress.
In my country Taxes are very high. Is it possible to keep the same price 
on the paper transmit to the transitor ?

Thank you,

Freddy BUMBALO
97 47 15
11 rue du Général Mangin
98800 Nouméa


Le 13/10/2025 à 21:37, SIMSONN a écrit :
>
>
>   SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>
> We apologize for the inconvenience. Due to New Caledonia's unique 
> logistics requirements, our standard shipping channels cannot 
> accommodate your order. We have identified an alternative shipping 
> method, but it is quite costly, with shipping fees reaching up to 
> 1,100 RMB (equivalent to $154.61 USD) and an estimated delivery time 
> of 3-7 days. We would need you to cover the $54.61 shipping cost. 
> Would you be able to accept this? If possible, please click the link 
> to complete payment. We will ship your order as soon as possible. 
> Thank you for your understanding.
> https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1
>
> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at 
> service@simsonn.com
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Freddy Bumbalo,    Thank you for your understanding. We have dispatched your order to the logistics provider and will be able to provide you with the tracking number tomorrow.
